metadata.title: DEPRECATED: ELSA-2013-0505 -- squid security and bug fix update (moderate)
metadata.description:
[7:3.1.10-16] - Resolves: #888198 - CVE-2012-5643: improved upstream patch
[7:3.1.10-15] - Reverts: #861062 - Squid delays on FQDNs that don't contains AAAA record
[7:3.1.10-14] - Resolves: #888198 - CVE-2012-5643: patch
[7:3.1.10-13] - Resolves: #888198 - CVE-2012-5643: DoS (excessive resource consumption)
[7:3.1.10-12] - Resolves #861062 - add configure directive --enable-internal-dns
[7:3.1.10-11 ] - Resolves #861062 - Squid delays on FQDNs that don't contains AAAA record
[7:3.1.10-10] - Resolves #798090 - Client timeout uses server-side 'read_timeout' - Resolves #833086 - Private md5 hash function does not comply FIPS - Resolves #782732 - Squid crashes by segfault when it reboots - Resolves #797571 - Squid userid is not added to wbpriv group - Disable strict-error-checking on account of squid-fips.patch
